title: [CLIENT] Kalista doesn't show up under Marksman tab in store
body:
If you go to the Marksman tab in the store, Kalista isn't shown among the champions there.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open champions tab in store
2. Select "Marksman" under "Attributes"

replies.body: That's because she's under the "Broken" filter.

Hey CawCaw Im Valor! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see why she's not showing up!
I know it's a pretty minor bug but it is still there.
Update! This is fixed on live. :] Thanks for bringing this to our attention!

Hiya! 

Looks like this had been resolved in April, and since then, the tag has fallen off. I'll take a look and get the tag added back in.
Upvoted for good bug reporting practices in your post :)
